Row.Text: Expedition Base
Aerodrome

+9[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Modern Military Building. Required to train Air Units. Air Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location. Packed Air Units have +1 Intercept Range. Must be placed on Flat Terrain. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building.

[B]Effect:[/B] Required to train Air Units. Air Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location. Packed Air Units have +1 Intercept Range.[n]Must be placed on Flat Terrain. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building.
When built for the first time, grants a free Squadron Commander.
Cannery
+9[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +10% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate. Modern Food Building.
[B]Effect:[/B] +10% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate.
City Park
+9 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Vegetated Terrain. Modern Happiness Building.
[B]Effect:[/B] +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Vegetated Terrain.
Defensive Fortifications

Adds 100 [icon:Action_Heal] HP to the District and +15 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength to Units defending in the tile. All [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement. Modern Fortification. Must be built adjacent to another [icon:CITY_URBAN] District with Walls or on the City Center. Can only be purchased on the City Center. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

[B]Effect:[/B] Adds 100 [icon:Action_Heal] HP to the District. All [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement.[n]Must be built adjacent to another [icon:CITY_URBAN] District with Walls or on the City Center. Can only be purchased on the City Center. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
Department Store
+12 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in this Settlement. Modern Happiness Building.
[B]Effect:[/B] +1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in this Settlement.
Factory

+12 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Allows one type of [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Factory Resource to be assigned to this Settlement. +1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in this Settlement. Modern Resource Building. Must be built in a Settlement connected to the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital by Railroad. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

[B]Effect:[/B] Allows one type of [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Factory Resource to be assigned to this Settlement. +1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in this Settlement.[N]Must be built in a Settlement connected to the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital by Railroad. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
Grocer

+4 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Camps, Farms, Fishing Boats, Pastures, and Plantations. [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse Food Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.

+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on the following Improvements in this Settlement from its [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse Bonus:[BLIST][LI] Camps[LI] Farms[LI] Fishing Boats[LI] Pastures[LI] Plantations[/BLIST][n]Can be purchased in Towns.
Ironworks

+4 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Mines, Quarries, Woodcutters, Clay Pits, Oil Rigs, and Mountain Terrain. [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse Production Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

+1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] on the following Improvements in this Settlement from its [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse Bonus:[BLIST][LI] Mines[LI] Quarries[LI] Woodcutters[LI] Clay Pits[LI] Oil Rigs[LI] Mountain Terrain[/BLIST][n]Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
Laboratory
+12 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters. Modern Science Building.
[B]Effect:[/B] +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters.
Launch Pad

+24 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Unlocks the [icon:DEFAULT_PROJECT] Launch Satellite Project. Modern Science Building. Must be placed on Flat Terrain. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building.

[B]Effect:[/B] Unlocks the [icon:DEFAULT_PROJECT] Launch Satellite Project.[N]Must be placed on Flat Terrain. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building.
Military Academy

+9[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Military Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location. Grants a free [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Level to new [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders trained in this Settlement.

[B]Effect:[/B] Military Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location. Grants a free [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Level to new [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders trained in this Settlement.
Modern Bridge

+6 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Allows Land Units to move over a Navigable River without having to Embark. Cheaper to build where a Road has already formed a Ferry across the River. Must be placed on a Navigable River. Unaffected by Floods. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

[B]Effect:[/B] Allows Land Units to move over a Navigable River without having to Embark. Unaffected by Floods.[n]Cheaper to build where a Road has already formed a Ferry across the River. Must be placed on a Navigable River. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
Museum
+9 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. Has 3 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Artifact slots. Modern Culture Building.
[B]Effect:[/B] Has 3 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Artifact slots.
Opera House
+12[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +6[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. Modern Culture and Diplomacy Building.
Modern Culture and Diplomacy Building.
Port

+9[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +2 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in this Settlement. Modern Gold Building. Naval Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location. Must be placed on Coast adjacent to land. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

[B]Effect:[/B] +2 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in this Settlement. Naval Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location.[N]Must be placed on Coast adjacent to land. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
Radio Station
+9[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and +9[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. Modern Diplomacy and Happiness Building.
Modern Diplomacy and Happiness Building.
Rail Station

+18 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Units in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with a Railroad. When built, upgrades any Roads to Settlements that also have a Rail Station into Railroads. Railroads allow Units to move from one Settlement with a Rail Station to another. Modern Gold Building. Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

[B]Effect:[/B] +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Units in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with a Railroad.[n]When built, upgrades any Roads to Settlements that also have a Rail Station into Railroads. Railroads allow Units to move from one Settlement with a Rail Station to another.[N]Occupies a full tile and cannot be paired with another [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building. Can be purchased in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Units in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with a Railroad.

+9[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Modern Science Building.
Modern Science Building.
Stock Exchange
+12 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters. Modern Gold Building.
[B]Effect:[/B] +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters.

Bang

Siamese Unique Improvement. +3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on a Navigable River.
Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on a Navigable River.[N]Siamese Unique Improvement.
Kabaka's Lake

Bugandan Unique Improvement. +3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Receives Lake yield bonuses, including yields for all Buganda's abilities and the Muzibu Azaala Mpanga Wonder. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain. One per Settlement.

[B]Effect:[/B] Receives Lake yield bonuses, including yields for all Buganda's abilities and the Muzibu Azaala Mpanga Wonder.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain. One per Settlement.[n]Bugandan Unique Improvement.
Obshchina

Russian Empire Unique Improvement. +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on all Farms in this Settlement. +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra Terrain. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Obshchina.

[B]Effect:[/B] +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture if placed in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra Terrain.[n]+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on all Farms in this Settlement.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Obshchina.[n]Russian Empire Unique Improvement.
Stepwell

Mughal Unique Improvement. +2 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food from adjacent Farms. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain. Cannot be placed adjacent to another Stepwell.

Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on Flat Terrain. Cannot be placed adjacent to another Stepwell.[n]Mughal Unique Improvement.
Shore Battery

City-State Unique Improvement. +5 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +3 [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged Combat Strength, +1 range to Ranged and Siege Units in this tile. +5 [icon:Action_Heal]Healing per turn to Military Units in this tile. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement adjacent to Coast.

[B]Effect:[/B] +3 [icon:Action_Ranged] Ranged Combat Strength, +1 Range to Ranged and Siege Units in this tile. +5 [icon:Action_Heal] healing per turn to Military Units in this tile.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement adjacent to Coast.[n]City-State Unique Improvement.
Open-Air Museum

City-State Unique Improvement. +5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for each adjacent Tropical tile, +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for each adjacent Tundra tile, and +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each adjacent Desert tile. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement. One Per Settlement.
Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement. One Per Settlement.[n]City-State Unique Improvement.
Entrepôt

City-State Unique Improvement. +5 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on every Navigable River tile in this Settlement. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on a Navigable River not adjacent to another Entrepôt.

[B]Effect:[/B] +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on every Navigable River tile in this Settlement.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement on a Navigable River not adjacent to another Entrepôt.[n]City-State Unique Improvement.
Institute

City-State Unique Improvement. +5 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on adjacent [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Wet or Vegetated Terrain. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement, and cannot be adjacent to another Institute.

+2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science to adjacent [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Wet or Vegetated Terrain.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement, and cannot be adjacent to another Institute.[n]City-State Unique Improvement.
Abattoir

Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement with a [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food yield, and cannot be adjacent to another Abattoir.

[B]Effect:[/B] +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and -1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on each Abattoir in this Settlement.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement with a [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food yield, and cannot be adjacent to another Abattoir.[n]City-State Unique Improvement.
Circus Fair

City-State Unique Improvement. +6 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence when built in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities. Ageless. Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement in Settlements with at least 15 [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population. One per Settlement.

+1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence when built in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.[n]Does not remove [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvement in Settlements with at least 15 [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population. One per Settlement.[n]City-State Unique Improvement.
Industrial Park
American Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Railyard and Steel Mill in the same District. +2 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in this Settlement.
+2 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in this Settlement.
Avenue

French Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Jardin à la Française and Salon in the same District. +2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters in this [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City. Allows training the [icon:UNIT_JACOBIN] Jacobin in this Settlement.
+2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters in this [icon:YIELD_CITIES]City.
Zaibatsu

Meiji Japan Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Ginkō and Jukogyo in the same District. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings in adjacent [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts. +1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in this Settlement.

+1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings in adjacent [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts. +1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in this Settlement.
Huiguan

+25%[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence in this Settlement.
Zócalo

Mexican Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Catedral and Portal de Mercaderes in the same District. +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition slotted into the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government. Allows training the [icon:UNIT_REVOLUCIONARIO] Revolucionario in this Settlement.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition slotted into the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.

Unlocks the [icon:DEFAULT_PROJECT] Operation Ivy Project if you have completed the Modern Military Legacy Path. This Wonder can be built by multiple Civilizations. Ageless.
